body.description: With a beautiful and sleek retro design, this microwave is sure to stand out in any kitchen. It features 12-pre programmed cooking settings and a bright LED display, making usability simple. Five power levels and 700-watts of power are perfect for reheating leftovers or cooking food.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Convenient Controls Choose your settings with just a turn of the dial. Our countertop microwave includes pre-programmed cooking settings, a timer, and express cooking controls. Microwave All Your Favorites All the power you need in a fun and convenient design. Nostalgia microwaves are fully functional and ready to heat popcorn, pizza, meat, veggies, and anything else you desire. Vintage Appliances Add a bit of retro flair to your kitchen decor. Our microwaves show off a classic design and stylish colors that look even better with the rest of our retro appliance line-up.

Nostalgia Retro Countertop Microwave Oven Nostalgia Retro Convection Toaster Oven Nostalgia Retro 12-Cup Coffee Maker Nostalgia Retro Electric Water Kettle Nostalgia Retro Wide 2-Slice Toaster Nostalgia Retro Breakfast Station Capacity 0.7 Cu Ft 0.7 Cu Ft 12 Cup 1.7 L 2 Slice 3-in-1 Available Colors Aqua, Red, Black, Pink, Yellow Aqua, Red Aqua, Red, Black, Pink, Yellow, Cream Aqua, Red, Pink Aqua, Red, Black, Pink, Yellow Aqua, Red, White, Pink, Yellow Additional Features Sure to stand out in any kitchen, this microwave features 12 pre-programmed setting and 800 watts of power Great for baking, convection baking, toasting and broiling a wide variety of tasty meals, snacks and desserts Start your morning out right with a freshly brewed pot of coffee! Featuring automatic shut off and pause-and-serve to pour a cup mid-brewing cycle Powerful, 1500-watt kettle rapidly boils up to 1.7 liters of water in just minutes Equipped with two large toasting slots to accommodate a variety of breads and 5 browning levels 3-In-1: This versatile breakfast station covers your entire morning breakfast, allowing you to make your Coffee, toast and eggs all at once

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Microwave with Unparalleled Style
reviews.reviewText: I used the microwave a month to make sure it wouldn't fall apart...based on some of the reviews here, I'm lucky the rotating plate didn't break, the handle didn't fall off, or the oven didn't burn down the kitchen. Instead, it survived, though it's only been a month, so who knows. Bottom line, this microwave is not only the best-looking microwave I've ever had, it's the easiest I've ever used. Hit the big round button and it turns on for one minute, then rotate the button to quickly scale your time up or down. There are a bunch of other features that are also easy to understand for anyone with a fifth grade education, but I've cooked meals and reheated items more than once a day for a month and I'm delighted with the overall performance.Yes, the interior light only comes on when the oven is running, not when you open the door. Are the other reviewers blind or something? That just isn't a big deal. Yes, it beeps three times when the cooking session ends. I don't live in a monastery under a vow of silence, so that's okay. The beeping is no louder than any other microwave I've owned. Yes, the power plug forces the microwave to sit about 2½ inches from the wall (see pics)...and the owners manual recommends it sit 3 inches from the wall for venting purposes. I'm okay with that.None of the hundreds of other reviews showed photos of the black version of the microwave, so I'm showing it in several pictures here. It is a handsome devil, even in black, and it harmonizes beautifully with my granite countertop. The interior is plenty big enough for a standard dinner plate (see pics), and therefore big enough for any frozen dinner.The 800 watts of power is slightly less than my usual 900 or 1,100 watts, but it cooks well and cooks evenly. I just follow the directions on a frozen dinner (which are written for 1,100 watt microwaves), maybe adding 10 or 20 seconds to the timing, and it comes out piping hot. Anyone who says it doesn't heat has a bad microwave and should return the oven within a week of purchasing...not sit around complaining about it.So I love my microwave. If it breaks in six months or six years, I'll just buy another one (hopefully when they are on sale, like I did this time). For intuitive microwavers like myself, it is unbelievably easy to use. And it's the most attractive retro-style microwave on the market, whatever color you choose, and it's really not a very close competition with any other design. I could not be happier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and a GOOD microwave
reviews.reviewText: Had the same style in black for more than a decade when it started to get rusty on the inner door. Still worked fine, but it was time to retire. The blue matches tile in my kitchen and it is just SO CHARMING. It works great, love the knob option (versus buttons to push to control time, etc). Its fairly quiet while on, too. The only thing I don't love is the alert when it's done. Three very loud chimes and there's no way out of it unless you open the door prematurely. Other than that, it's simply a great microwave!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, just big enough
reviews.reviewText: For everyday use you only need the one dial at the bottom. Push it in and adjust the time on the fly. Works great. There's a handy express button for 30 seconds, and a power level button that takes a minute to learn but lets you custom defrost. There are 12 cooking modes but who uses those, really? This tool is solid, looks ok, fits a 10.5 inch dinner plate. Five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s smaller than a regular microwave but can still fit just about anything you wanna heat up. Very unique style & lots of options for cooking food, barely needed the manual to get it set up and figuring out what each option is meant to do. I also got it discounted for slightly damaged packaging but it works perfectly. Best appliance i’ve ever boughtAlso featuring my cat & the decor i like to keep on top

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional, but high price for low features
reviews.reviewText: It's super cute and definitely gives a retro-vibe, but there's no time display, and the door requires a manual tug to open. It has some pre-set cook times, can adjust power, and is pretty compact, but for the price, I would've liked a few more comfort features than the bare minimum, such as a timer setting or even just the time displayed. And I move the whole microwave when trying to open the door, despite the microwave itself being pretty heavy.Overall happy with it, as it's super cute and does what I need, but I've had to get a timer and clock to supplement what a microwave normally does.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We purchased a mobile home that is really small and there is absolutely NO counter space. However, this gorgeous microwave fit in perfectly and I just love it! It adds style and taste to this old mobile. Super easy to use. A little on the noisy side but honestly no noiser than any other microwave I have ever had. My favorite purchase so far for my new home. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this and it looks really nice
reviews.reviewText: This is such a cute microwave but it really works so well! Heats evenly, decent size and light! I put two small pieces of 3m tape on the feet so it wouldn’t slide on the granite countertop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good microwave, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I really like this.Heats well, and easy to use once you realize how simple it is. I use it less than oven and air fryer, but comes in clutch when I need it. I haven't used all the settings, but based on what I have used, I've got to assume they're pretty good.Dial is responsive and controls almost everything - if you have kids or are naturally hard on equipment this may be something to avoid. While the dial isn't flimsy, it may not stand up to serious abuse.I got the orange color. It's slightly more creamsicle than orange, but still looks good.
I have had many nostalgia products and the microwave is the only one worth buying. It works really well.

reviews.reviewerName: Esta más que hermoso super detallado, la ranita  de chocolate en su manita pequeña es lo máximo!!!
reviews.reviewText: Estoy fascinada con el micro, el color está bellísimo, calienta súper bien con una variedad de opciones para calentado y totalmente estilo vintage!

This microwave is pretty but that's it. I paid over 300 for it and I bought it July 10th 2023. Its now the end of August 2023. It constantly pops when it's on and it's in the garbage now. This is a dangerous product. Seller will not refund at all.
Muy útil y decorativo, de muy buen tamaño
